zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，短期下行风险]
zh.content:
当前以太坊/美元（ETH/USD）价格在1937.19附近，短期内呈现震荡整理的走势。虽然价格略有下跌，但整体波动幅度较小，表明市场仍缺乏明确的趋势方向。短期可能出现轻微的下行压力，但并未出现强烈的熊市信号。

从技术指标来看，RSI暂时无法提供参考，MACD处于负值区间（-11.46706），显示出卖压较重，且短期可能缺乏反弹动力。SMA(20)位于1953.14，作为短期阻力位，价格若突破此水平，则可能开启一波反弹。然而，当前的下行风险仍然存在，需警惕进一步下探的可能。

支撑位方面，1934.78附近为关键支撑区域，若价格进一步跌破该水平，则可能测试更低价位，甚至可能跌向1900美元附近。若该支撑位有效，则可能为买入机会。反之，1947.37一线为重要阻力，若突破则有可能引发价格回升至更高水平。

建议投资者保持谨慎操作，关注价格在1934-1947区间的表现。如果价格跌破支撑位，可以考虑适时止损；若价格突破阻力位，则可考虑短期买入。整体市场情绪相对平稳，但存在一定的不确定性。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum (ETH) against the US Dollar is showing a slightly bearish trend in the short term. The price has seen a minor decline of -0.13% over the past 24 hours, with the current price at $1937.19. ETH’s price movement has been relatively tight, trading between a high of $1947.37 and a low of $1934.78. This narrow range signals low volatility and a lack of strong momentum in either direction. The overall market sentiment could shift quickly, but for now, there is little indication of a breakout.

The absence of an RSI reading makes it harder to gauge the underlying momentum, but the MACD value of -11.46706 is a critical indicator. A negative MACD indicates a bearish bias, suggesting that there is downward pressure on the price. Since the MACD is not yet crossing any signal line, it further reinforces the uncertainty, meaning traders should be cautious. In the context of technical indicators, this presents a more neutral-to-bearish outlook for the short term.

Looking at support and resistance levels, the immediate support for ETH/USD is at the recent low of $1934.78. If this level holds, it could prevent further downside. On the other hand, resistance lies near the 20-day simple moving average (SMA) at $1953.14, which has acted as a ceiling for price movements over the last few days. A break above this resistance could signal a reversal toward a more bullish trend, though the market remains hesitant at this point.

Considering the current conditions, a cautious approach is advisable. Traders could look to buy near support levels, particularly if price tests $1934.78, while placing stops below this level to manage risk. Conversely, if the price pushes through the SMA resistance, short-term bullish strategies may become viable. Monitoring the MACD and price movements will provide further clarity on the direction.
